Headline: No trains between Garfield and Ashland/63rd
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Ashland/63rd due to a stalled train at 63rd/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Ashland/63rd due to a stalled train at 63rd/Halsted.

Green Line trains will operate from Harlem/Lake to 63rd Cottage Grove ONLY.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

If possible consider the Red Line as a service alternative to the Green Line at this time.

 As a result of the delayed train, shuttle buses are available from Garfield and 63rd/Ashland to provide connecting service through the affected area,

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Downtown Purple Line Express trains Service Rerouted via Subway to Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Purple Line Express trains are rerouted via State Street (Red Line) Subway from Fullerton thru Roosevelt. Board on Howard-bound side at Red Line subway stops.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line Express trains are being rerouted into the State Street (Red Line) Subway after Fullerton, making all stops, in both directions from North/Clybourn to Roosevelt.

Trains are being rerouted due to track switching problems near Clark/Lake.

Purple Line Express service to downtown

Loop-bound Purple Line Express  trains will make all regular stops through Fullerton, and then be rerouted into the State Street (Red Line) Subway through Roosevelt.

Purple Line Express service from downtown

Linden-bound Purple Line Express trains will make Red Line stops from Roosevelt through Fullerton. Trains will not serve Loop stations nor those from Merchandise Mart through Armitage.

Board on the Howard-bound side at Red Line subway stations or use Red Line service as an alternative.

Allow extra travel time.
